articles.title: Layoffs: TCS says it won’t hand out pink slips but hikes to its employees - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) has said that the company is not considering layoffs. Further the Indian IT tech giant is looking to hire employees laid off by startups and will also be announcing hikes which will be similar to earlier years.
